name: drapeau
description: Take care of your ragged lines

scripts.example: microbundle -i example/example.js -f umd -o example --target browser --external all
scripts.example:serve: npm run example -- -w --compress false & light-server -s example -p 8080 -w example/**/*
scripts.preversion: npm run example && git add example
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npm run example:deploy && npm publish

author: Arnaud Juracek
